name: Delightfyl - Demo²
description:
Back with a completly new demo! Its now nearly 9 months later after the first demo. I present to you, demo², a complete new experience with even more content and features.
Please beware that this demo is not 100% finished yet, some features and art are still missing. There is alot more to come in the future.

Please think about donating, now is the time! Redirects to PayPal. Donate What is Delightfyl? Delightfyl is a first person story driven stealth experience. You take the role of Yoana, a masterful thief and naturalist, who, together with her sidekick and partner, Zaya, are dragged into a dangerous conspiracy. The city is old and build with sweat, tears and blood but Yoana is well versed in its layers and rifts. Deep under, where old city stacks atop of the next... unlimited danger and treasure awaits. Yoana is equipped with a large array of tools and gadgets... the rest is hers to steal. Hardcore Stealth and Immersive Simulation
  • Stealth based on visibility and sound
  • Highly sensible and interactive AI
  • Multiple Tools and Gadgets
  • A vast variety of loot to find
  • Physics interaction to either distract AI or overcome obstacles
  • Swimming, Climbing, Crouching and Mantling
  • Ladders and Ropes
  • Special objectives
  • Different difficulties
  • Quicksave/Quickload and Hardsave
  • Special Items and Secret areas
  • Special extra Difficulty settings
You decide on what way you complete a mission. You can kill whenever you want or just sneak past everyone and never be seen. Take as much loot as you must... but not everything? Explore every inch of the level until you are absolutly satisfied!
The extra difficulty modes will further help you with accomplishing your goal of having fun! Get in Touch

Minimum Hardware Requirements Operating System Windows 7 / 10CPU Ryzen 5 Memory 8gb GPU GTX 1050 / GTX 1060 Free Space 7gb Best played with Headphones All the music in this game is unique and was made for this game
